com.appittome.udacity.client
Class SwipeAdapter.UdacityListFragment

java.lang.Object
  ListFragment
      com.appittome.udacity.client.SwipeAdapter.UdacityListFragment
Enclosing class:
SwipeAdapter
public static class SwipeAdapter.UdacityListFragment
extends ListFragment

ListFragment object to populate for each page of the swipeAdapter. This object forms the lists that are swiped through in the swipeAdapter, or "pages" of the view.

getType

public int getType()
Return the current type of this listFragment

Returns:
an integer representing the type of this object, and it's position in the view 0 - course list, 1 - unit list, 2 - nugget list.
